ol.li: Contains zero or more [0..*] surrogateRecipient, where its type is Alert Surrogate Recipient
Contains exactly one [1..1] recipient, where its type is Individual Provider
Contains zero or more [0..*] alertInstance, where its type is Alert Event Instance
